name: High-Watch Cliffs
role_in_state: strategic coastal lookout and maritime enforcement
culture_adjustments: tide-timekeeping doubled into hourly watch shifts
greater suspicion of strangers; formal inspection customs
constraints: limited arable land and overland access
ritual magic dependent on imported reagents
notes: beacon-festivals govern navigation windows; auguries limited to aiding charts
watch-garrisons double as customs inspectors and rescue crews
hidden coves facilitate both legal trans-shipment and contraband
